DOC.brief_summary: The main objective current study examine whether high intake regular-fat cheese ( Danbo Cheddar ) affect blood lipid differently isocaloric intake either fatty animal food product starchy carbohydrate . Furthermore , effect fat digestibility , blood pressure , anthropometry , bile acid metabolism insulin sensitivity investigate . To , randomize crossover intervention study 3x14 day full diet period ( cheese diet , meat diet carb diet ) conduct 16 postmenopausal woman . Between diet period least 14 day wash-out subject eat habitual diet . Fasting blood sample draw diet period , also non-fasting blood sample drawn diet period . Furthermore , total feces collect last 5 day diet period .
DOC.criteria: Female gender Postmenopausal > 1 year Age 4568 year BMI 2532 kg/m2 TC > 4.5 mmol/L < 7 mmol/L Systolic blood pressure < 160 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure < 100 mmHg Chronic disease ( know diabetes ; CVD ; chronic disease could affect result present study ) Milk allergy Nut allergy Use dietary supplement incl . multivitamin ( 2 month entire study period ) Smoking Elite athlete ( > 10 hour strenuous physical activity per week ) Use prescription medicine could affect result present study include systemic glucocorticoid Use lipidlowering agent Stable dose antihypertensive medication > 3 month study commencement subject high blood pressure Hormone replacement therapy Blood donation < 1 month study commencement study period Simultaneous participation clinical study Inability ( physically psychologically ) comply procedure require protocol
